com.redrield.kinventories.java

Class InventoryBuilder

  • com.redrield.kinventories.java.InventoryBuilder

  • public class InventoryBuilder

    Main class for java interop code for KInventories. Represents an inventory that is in the process of being created. Can retrieve the underlying inventory with InventoryBuilder.build

    See Also:
    InventoryBuilder.build

        public InventoryBuilder addItem(Material material,
                                int amount,
        Consumer<ItemStackBuilder> block)

        Function to add an item to the current builder

        Parameters:
        material - The material of the ItemStack to be created
        amount - The amount of items in the ItemStack to be created
        block - The callback to add data to the ItemStack
        Returns:
        instance, for chaining
        See Also:
        java.util.function.Consumer

      • addItem

        public InventoryBuilder addItem(Material material,
                                int amount,
                                int slot,
                                Consumer<ItemStackBuilder> block)

        Function to add an item to the current builder in a particular slot

        Parameters:
        material - The material of the ItemStack to be created
        amount - The amount of items in the ItemStack to be created
        slot - The slot in which to add the ItemStack in the internal inventory
        block - The callback to add data to the ItemStack
        Returns:
        instance, for chaining

      • create

        public static InventoryBuilder create(java.lang.String name,
                                      int size)

        Function to create an empty inventory builder

        Parameters:
        name - the name of the inventory
        size - The size of the inventory. Must be a multiple of 9
        Returns:
        a new InventoryBuilder with the set name and size
